description: Service delivery, support, and operational execution

typical_processes.name: Incident Management Process
typical_processes.description: Handling and resolving customer or system incidents

common_outputs.name: Resolved Support Tickets
common_outputs.description: Customer issues that have been investigated and resolved
common_pain_points: Resolution time is too long (SLA breaches)

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Train agents on products, hire senior support staff
typical_improvement_opportunities.system_capabilities: AI-powered answer suggestions, automated ticket routing, chatbots
typical_improvement_opportunities.process_maturity: Standardize resolution procedures, build knowledge base

common_outputs.name: IT Incident Resolutions
common_outputs.description: System outages and technical issues that have been resolved
common_pain_points: Mean time to resolution (MTTR) is too high

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Train on incident response, hire SRE specialists
typical_improvement_opportunities.system_capabilities: AIOps for root cause analysis, automated remediation, predictive alerting
typical_improvement_opportunities.process_maturity: Implement runbooks, post-incident reviews, proactive monitoring

common_outputs.name: Project Status Reports
common_outputs.description: Regular updates on project progress, risks, and issues
common_pain_points: Reports are outdated by the time they're shared
Manual data gathering from multiple sources
Status is overly optimistic (green until red)

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Train PMs on reporting standards, hire PMO analysts
typical_improvement_opportunities.system_capabilities: Automated status dashboards, real-time project tracking, AI risk detection
typical_improvement_opportunities.process_maturity: Standardize reporting templates, implement project governance

common_outputs.name: Purchase Orders
common_outputs.description: Formal orders to vendors for goods or services
common_pain_points: PO creation takes too long (delays procurement)
Errors in PO details (wrong quantities, prices)

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Train on procurement procedures, hire procurement specialists
typical_improvement_opportunities.system_capabilities: Automated PO generation, catalog-based ordering, spend analytics
typical_improvement_opportunities.process_maturity: Standardize requisition-to-PO workflow, implement approval rules

common_outputs.name: Inventory Reports
common_outputs.description: Current stock levels, locations, and movements
common_pain_points: Inventory data is inaccurate (doesn't match physical)

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Train on inventory procedures, hire inventory analysts
typical_improvement_opportunities.system_capabilities: RFID/barcode automation, AI demand forecasting, real-time tracking
typical_improvement_opportunities.process_maturity: Implement cycle counting, optimize reorder points

common_outputs.name: Resource Allocations
common_outputs.description: Assignment of people and resources to projects/tasks
common_pain_points: Can't see resource availability across projects

typical_improvement_opportunities.team_execution: Train on resource planning, hire resource managers
typical_improvement_opportunities.system_capabilities: Resource management software, capacity planning, AI-powered allocation
typical_improvement_opportunities.process_maturity: Standardize allocation process, implement utilization targets
